metadata.Title: CVE-2023-23088 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: Buffer OverFlow Vulnerability in Barenboim json-parser master and v1.1.0 fixed in v1.1.1 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code via the json_value_parse function.

notes.Note: ccdm94> "This json parser was created for the project of C++ Workflow". The above quote is from the project README. This and further research indicated that workflow contains an embedded copy of this code.

criterions.comment: workflow package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
